{{Actor| | type = Quest item | name = Money | class = Gold50 | game = Strife | doomednum = 140 | convid = 171, 164, 168 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Coin|Coin]]→Gold50
A chest full of coins. Worth 50 gold. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Gold50 : {{Class|Coin}} { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 50 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_50GOLD" // "50 gold" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_50GOLD" // "You picked up 50 gold." States { Spawn: CHST A -1 Stop } }
